segments.text: Good Morning , Mrs . Schmidt ! I see you're standing on your head again .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi , Kathy ! I'm just doing my morning yoga ! You're up awfully early today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have to finish preparing a paper for my Western Civilization class .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How has school been going ? You come home so late every night ! You're really a hard worker ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually , I study a lot less here than I did in Taiwan ! My classes are great , though . Sociology is the perfect major for me .
segments.speaker: S1
